Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/61st
ShortDescription: 94 buses temp. rerouted NB: California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California; SB: California, 59th, Western, 63rd and Calfornia, near California/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near California/61st.

Northbound buses will operate via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 59th, Western, 63rd and Calfornia.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays at O'Hare and Forest Park. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays at O'Hare and Forest Park. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
